longBusinessSummary.0: Campus Activewear Limited manufactures, distributes, and sells sports and athleisure footwear products for men, women, and kids and children in India and internationally. The company offers running, walking, and casual shoes; casual and sports sandals and floaters; slippers, flip flops, and slides; and accessories, such as backpacks, caps, and socks under the CAMPUS brand name. As of September 30, 2021, it operated 48 company owned and operated stores and 3 franchises. The company distributes its products through multi-brand outlets, e-commerce platforms, and exclusive brand outlets. Campus Activewear Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in New Delhi, India.
